DOCNAME: CASE OF IOANNIS PAPADOPOULOS v. GREECE
CONCLUSION: Violation of Art. 6-1;Non-pecuniary damage - financial award
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in GPE .

CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant was arrested in flagrante delicto for entering without prior authorisation to the operation block of the hospital where he was working . He was placed in detention for DATE .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG found the applicant guilty and sentenced him to DATE imprisonment . The same day the applicant appealed against this decision . His appeal has suspensive effect . The hearing was scheduled for DATE .
